mapper.insert: insert into notes (noteId, title, content, createdOn, lastUpdatedOn, userId) values (#{noteId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createdOn}, #{lastUpdatedOn}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select noteId, title, content, createdOn, lastUpdatedOn, userId from notes where userId = #{userId}
select noteId, title, content, createdOn, lastUpdatedOn, userId from notes where noteId = #{noteId}
